code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./AdminDashboard.css';import FinancialPerformance from'./FinancialPerformance';import PredictiveAnalytics from'./PredictiveAnalytics';import TradingInsights from'./TradingInsights';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminDashboard=()=>{const[metrics,setMetrics]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[transactions,setTransactions]=useState([]);const token=localStorage.getItem('token');useEffect(()=>{const fetchMetrics=async()=>{if(!token){setError('You must log in first.');setLoading(false);return;}try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/analytics/overview',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setMetrics(response.data);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching metrics:',err);setError('Failed to load metrics. Please check the server.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};const fetchTransactions=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/transactions',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setTransactions(response.data);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching transactions:',err);}};fetchMetrics();fetchTransactions();},[token]);if(!token)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tile analytics",style:{gridRow:'1',gridColumn:'1'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Analytics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FinancialPerformance,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tile financial-performance",style:{gridRow:'1',gridColumn:'2'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Financial Performance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PredictiveAnalytics,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tile predictive-analytics",style:{gridRow:'2',gridColumn:'1'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Predictive Analytics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TradingInsights,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tile trading-insights",style:{gridRow:'2',gridColumn:'2'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Trading Insights"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tile transactions",style:{gridRow:'3',gridColumn:'1 / span 2'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Current Transactions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:transactions.slice(0,10).map((transaction,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[transaction.id,": ",transaction.amount," - ",transaction.status]},index))})]})]})]});};export default AdminDashboard;
